title: 98 66 6 "The Sand Trap""Enter the Desert Pirates! The Men Who Live Freely!"Transliteration: "Sabaku no kaizokudan tōjō! Jiyū ni ikiru otokotachi" (Japanese:砂漠の海賊団登場!自由に生きる男達) Daisuke Nishio Junki Takegami January 27, 2002(2002-01-27)[20] April 5, 2006[21]May 6, 2006[22]
transformers_text: 98 66 6 The S and Trap Enter the Desert Pirates The Men Who Live Freely Transliteration S a baku no kai z oku dan t j J iy ni iki ru o toko tachi Japanese Daisuke Nishi o Junk i Take gam i January 27 2002 2002 01 27 20 April 5 2006 21 May 6 2006 22 Nami and Viv i found themselves an easier way to travel in the desert and leave all men behind While trying to catch up with them Ace gets lost Luffy and the rest of the gang find the Desert Pirates and Viv i meets a figure from her past She learns that the two met while they were young girls and despite her father's offer to help if anything happened to the town the town was abandoned when the drought started and the sandstorms hit Viv i apologizes and the two reconcile
